content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]
thought: I want to craft a spruce door. To do so I need to place 6 spruce planks in the crafting grid in a specific pattern. I will start by moving 1 spruce plank from slot 15 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]
thought: I will now move a second spruce plank to slot 2. This will place the spruce plank next to the one already in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I need to place a spruce plank below the two I have already placed. I will move the spruce plank from slot 15 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]
thought: Next I will move a spruce plank from slot 15 to slot 5. This will place the spruce plank to the right of the one in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I will move a spruce plank from slot 15 to slot 7. This will place the spruce plank below the one in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]
thought: Finally I will move a spruce plank from slot 15 to slot 8. This will place the spruce plank to the right of the one in slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 8 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_door", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 28, "index": 19}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that the spruce door has been crafted, I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
